title: Richard Herring • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #96
itunes:title: Richard Herring • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #96
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the yet another national treasure, it’s comedian and podcaster RICHARD HERRING!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the yet another national treasure, it’s comedian and podcaster RICHARD HERRING!


Brett is zooming things up VERY nicely right now with a solid gold cast of legends in this lockdown period! You wouldn’t know that anything was wrong at all! I mean, minus the references and such. Anyway this is another example of greatness as Richard, star of RHLSTP (that’s how you say it) and comedy and all things awesome takes a trip the afterlife cinema with Brett, to dig deep upon all things cinematic through his life. Some great chat up top about home schooling and the perils thereof, country life and how said homeschooling has delivered valuable family time, the potential and present effects of lockdown and quarantine on comedy and what that means on a greater scale, and a ton more with some choice meanderings. Have a good’un folks, you’ll love it.


LINKS FOR THIS EPISODE:

RICHARD on THE INTERNET!

RHLSTP!

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM!

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON!

SUPERBOB - Brett's 2015 feature film!

CORNERBOYS with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!

DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM
